content: For you have stumbled  fallen [visited by tragedy], because of your sin.
Take the words [confessing your guilt] with you and return to the .
Say to Him, “Take away all our wickedness;
Accept what is good  receive us graciously,
So that we may present the fruit of our lips (gratitude).
We will not ride on horses [relying on military might],
Nor will we say again to [the idols who are] the work of our hands,
For in You [O ] the orphan finds love  compassion  mercy.”
